Vrml2Sourcebook.Chapter03Shapes

Class Figure03_01DefaultBoxWithAxes

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vrml2Sourcebook.Chapter03Shapes.Figure03_01DefaultBoxWithAxes

  • public class Figure03_01DefaultBoxWithAxes
extends java.lang.Object

    Default Box uses default values, coordinate axes superimposed to show X3D/VRML directions.

    Related links: Figure03_01DefaultBoxWithAxes.java source, Figure03_01DefaultBoxWithAxes catalog page, X3D Resources, X3D Scene Authoring Hints, and X3D Tooltips.

    This program uses the X3D Java Scene Access Interface Library (X3DJSAIL). It has been produced using the X3dToJava.xslt stylesheet to create Java source code from an .x3d model.
